front.title: Simple and Efficient Read Support for Sparse Files

abstract.t: This document proposes a new READPLUS operation for NFSv4.2 tosupport efficient reading of sparse files, which are growing in thedata center due to the increasing number of virtual disk images.READPLUS has all the features and functionality of READ, but has anextensible return value that includes an easy and efficient way foradministrators to copy and manage sparse files without wasting diskspace or transferring data unnecessarily.
